title: Unturned（未变异者）2.1.3更新！！
author: 沉默的羔羊
txt_content:
本帖最后由 沉默的羔羊 于 2014-7-17 21:15 编辑 

Update 2.1.3
7月15日  - NELSON SEXTON
Hello! 
Tomorrow morning at around 10:00 AM Mountain Standard Time I'll be streaming work on a new town in PEI on my Twitch channel Dev_Nelson[www.twitch.tv], so come hang out and provide some feedback or ask questions! 
Today I got a ton of progress done on the Steam server integration and learned a lot about how they work which will be really helpful. I even got the chance to talk to rlabrecque some more and he's doing some fantastic work improving the C++ to C# workflow, so thanks to him Steam servers will be coming sooner than originally expected! Note: Steam servers are not in the public branch as of yet. 
Tweaks: 
-Improved anticheat verus speedhacks. 
-Improved anticheat versus fake cars to prevent lag. 
-Improved the long hair style to be more lopsided. 
-Increased home respawn timer to 20 seconds. 
Fixes: 
-Fixed zombies to not attack two things at once. 


翻译：
更新2.1.3
7月15日         - NELSON SEXTON7月15日-尼尔森塞克斯顿
Hello! 您好。
Tomorrow morning at around 10:00 AM Mountain Standard Time I'll be streaming work on a new town in PEI on my Twitch channel Dev_Nelson[www.twitch.tv], so come hang out and provide some feedback or ask questions! 明天上午10点左右是山地标准时间我会流我抽搐通道dev_nelson [ www.twitch在培新城镇工作。电视]，所以来挂和提供反馈或问问题！
Today I got a ton of progress done on the Steam server integration and learned a lot about how they work which will be really helpful. I even got the chance to talk to rlabrecque some more and he's doing some fantastic work improving the C++ to C# workflow, so thanks to him Steam servers will be coming sooner than originally expected! Note: Steam servers are not in the public branch as of yet. 今天我有一大堆的进步对蒸汽服务器集成做了很多关于他们的工作将是有益的。我甚至有机会说话rlabrecque一些和他做的一些奇妙的工作提高C++ C #工作流，感谢他蒸汽服务器将比原来预计的要早！注：蒸汽服务器不在公共部门作为呢。
Tweaks: 调整：
-Improved anticheat verus speedhacks. 改进的anticheat维鲁斯加速器。
-Improved anticheat versus fake cars to prevent lag. 改进的anticheat与假汽车防止滞后。
-Improved the long hair style to be more lopsided. 改进的长发造型更加平衡。
-Increased home respawn timer to 20 seconds. -增加了家居的刷新时间为20秒。
Fixes: 修正：
-Fixed zombies to not attack two things at once.固定的僵尸不立刻攻击两件事。
